mapper.sql: select t.* from ( select v.*,rownum as rn from (
mapper.select: select m.customerNo, m.customerName, decode(m.sex,'0','男','1','女') sex, to_char(m.birthday,'yyyy-MM-dd') birthday, (select codename from cf_codedef where code=m.documenttype and codetype='idtype') documentType, m.documentNo, (select wm_concat(distinct ad.mobile) from cf_customeraddress ad where ad.customerno = m.customerno) mobile from cf_customermaininfo m where m.customerno = #{searchParam} union select m.customerNo, m.customerName, decode(m.sex,'0','男','1','女') sex, to_char(m.birthday,'yyyy-MM-dd') birthday, (select codename from cf_codedef where code=m.documenttype and codetype='idtype') documentType, m.documentNo, (select wm_concat(distinct ad.mobile) from cf_customeraddress ad where ad.customerno = m.customerno) mobile from cf_customermaininfo m where m.documentno = #{searchParam} union select m.customerNo, m.customerName, decode(m.sex,'0','男','1','女') sex, to_char(m.birthday,'yyyy-MM-dd') birthday, (select codename from cf_codedef where code=m.documenttype and codetype='idtype') documentType, m.documentNo, (select wm_concat(distinct ad.mobile) from cf_customeraddress ad where ad.customerno = m.customerno) mobile from cf_customermaininfo m where exists ( select 1 from cf_customeraddress a where a.customerno=m.customerno and a.mobile=#{searchParam} )
SELECT T.SEARCHNAME HISTORYNAME FROM CF_CUSTOMERSEARCHTRACE T WHERE T.USERID = #{userId} ORDER BY T.MAKEDATE DESC

delete.if: DELETE FROM CF_CUSTOMERSEARCHTRACE T WHERE T.USERID = #{userCode} AND T.SEARCHNAME = #{historyName}

mapper.delete: delete from cf_customersearchtrace s where not exists (select 1 from (select t.* from (select ss.* from cf_customersearchtrace ss where ss.userid = #{userCode} order by ss.makedate desc) t where rownum <= 10 ) b where b.serialno = s.serialno)
mapper.select: select count(*) from cms_emailmaininfo where email=#{email} and erole=#{eRole}
mapper.insert: insert into CMS_EMAILMAININFO (id,email,epassword,ehost,Enickname,Estatus,erole,makedate,Makeuser,Modifydate,Modifyuser) values (#{id},#{email},#{ePassword},#{eHost},#{nickName},#{eStatus},#{eRole}, TO_DATE(#{makeDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{makeUser},TO_DATE(#{modifyDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{modifyUser})
mapper.select: select e.id, e.email, e.ePassword, e.eHost, e.enickName nickName, (case e.estatus when '1' then '启用' when '0' then '停用' end) eStatus, (case e.eRole when 'S' then '发件邮箱' when 'T' then '通讯邮箱' end) eRole from cms_emailmaininfo e where e.erole=#{eRole}
mapper.update: update cms_emailmaininfo set estatus=#{eStatus} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select e.id, e.email, e.ePassword, e.eHost, e.enickName nickName, e.eStatus, e.eRole from cms_emailmaininfo e where e.id=#{id}

select m.email, m.ePassword, m.eHost, m.enickname nickName, m.eStatus, a.eRole from cms_emailjobaddress a, cms_emailmaininfo m where a.emailid = m.id and m.estatus = '1' and a.emailjobcode = #{emailJobCode}

select d.emailJobCode, d.emailJobName, (select m.email from cms_emailjobaddress a, cms_emailmaininfo m where a.emailid = m.id and a.emailjobcode = d.emailjobcode and a.erole = 'S' and m.estatus = '1') emailSender, (select wm_concat(m.email) from cms_emailjobaddress a, cms_emailmaininfo m where a.emailid = m.id and a.emailjobcode = d.emailjobcode and a.erole = 'R' and m.estatus = '1') emailReceiver, (select wm_concat(m.email) from cms_emailjobaddress a, cms_emailmaininfo m where a.emailid = m.id and a.emailjobcode = d.emailjobcode and a.erole = 'C' and m.estatus = '1') emailCopype from cms_emailjobdef d where exists (select 1 from cms_emailjobaddress a where a.emailjobcode = d.emailjobcode)
